verses.verse: Miriam <S%H4813><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> against Moses <S%H4872><s%> because of <S%H182><s%> the Cushite <S%H3571><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> whom he had married; <S%H3947><s%> for he had married <S%H3947><s%> a Cushite <S%H3571><s%> woman. <S%H802><s%>

They said, <S%H559><s%> "Has Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> indeed spoken <S%H559><s%> only with Moses? <S%H4872><s%> Hasn't <S%H1696><s%> he spoken also with us? <S%H3068><s%>" And Yahweh heard it. <S%H8085><s%>
Now the man <S%H376><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> humble, <S%H6035><s%> above all the men <S%H120><s%> who were on the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the earth. <S%H127><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> suddenly <S%H6597><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and to Miriam, <S%H4813><s%> "You three <S%H7969><s%> come out <S%H3318><s%> to the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting! <S%H4150><s%>" The three <S%H7969><s%> of them came out. <S%H3318><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%> in a pillar <S%H5982><s%> of cloud, <S%H6051><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent, <S%H168><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and Miriam; <S%H4813><s%> and they both <S%H8147><s%> came forward. <S%H3318><s%>

He said, <S%H559><s%> "Hear <S%H8085><s%> now my words. <S%H1697><s%> If there is a prophet <S%H5030><s%> among you, <S%H3068><s%> I Yahweh will make myself known <S%H3045><s%> to him in a vision. <S%H4759><s%> I will speak <S%H1696><s%> with him in a dream. <S%H2472><s%>
My servant <S%H5650><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> is not so. <S%H539><s%> He is faithful in all my house. <S%H1004><s%>

With him I will speak <S%H1696><s%> mouth <S%H6310><s%> to mouth, <S%H6310><s%> even plainly, <S%H4758><s%> and not in riddles; <S%H2420><s%> and he shall see <S%H5027><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s form. <S%H8544><s%> Why then were you not afraid <S%H3372><s%> to speak <S%H1696><s%> against my servant, <S%H5650><s%> against Moses? <S%H4872><s%>"
The anger <S%H639><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against them; <S%H3212><s%> and he departed.

The cloud <S%H6051><s%> departed <S%H5493><s%> from over the Tent; <S%H168><s%> and behold, <S%H4813><s%> Miriam was leprous, <S%H6879><s%> as white as snow. <S%H7950><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> looked <S%H6437><s%> at Miriam, <S%H4813><s%> and behold, <S%H6879><s%> she was leprous.

Aaron <S%H175><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Oh, <S%H994><s%> my lord, <S%H113><s%> please don't <S%H7896><s%> count this sin <S%H2403><s%> against us, <S%H2973><s%> in which we have done foolishly, and in which we have sinned. <S%H2398><s%>

Let her not, <S%H4994><s%> I pray, be as one dead, of whom the flesh <S%H1320><s%> is half <S%H2677><s%> consumed <S%H398><s%> when he comes out <S%H3318><s%> of his mother <S%H517><s%>'s womb. <S%H7358><s%>"
Moses <S%H4872><s%> cried <S%H6817><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Heal <S%H7495><s%> her, <S%H410><s%> God, I beg you!"

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "If her father <S%H1><s%> had but <S%H3417><s%> spit <S%H3417><s%> in her face, <S%H6440><s%> shouldn't <S%H3637><s%> she be ashamed seven <S%H7651><s%> days? <S%H3117><s%> Let her be shut <S%H5462><s%> up outside <S%H2351><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> and after <S%H310><s%> that she shall be brought in again. <S%H622><s%>"

Miriam <S%H4813><s%> was shut <S%H5462><s%> up outside <S%H2351><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> didn't <S%H5265><s%> travel until Miriam <S%H4813><s%> was brought in again. <S%H622><s%>
Afterward <S%H310><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Hazeroth, <S%H2698><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Paran. <S%H6290><s%>
